CustomField.formula: If(LEN(Account__r.ShippingStreet)>0, Account__r.ShippingStreet, "") & BR() & If(LEN(Account__r.ShippingPostalCode)>0, Account__r.ShippingPostalCode, "") & BR() & If(LEN(Account__r.ShippingCity)>0, Account__r.ShippingCity, "") & BR() & If(LEN(Account__r.ShippingState)>0, Account__r.ShippingState, "") & BR() & If(LEN(Account__r.ShippingCountry)>0, Account__r.ShippingCountry, "")
CustomField.label: Shipping Address
